record.title: ADJOURNMENT UNTIL MONDAY, APRIL 30, 2007, AT 2:45 P.M.

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, if there is no further business today, I ask unanimous consent that the Senate stand adjourned under the previous order.

record.narrative: There being no objection, the Senate, at 6 p.m., adjourned until Monday, April 30, 2007, at 2:45 p.m.
